name: Poolians Real Pool 3D
description:
Poolians is the leading social network for pool gamers. Meet fun people here and play high-quality games with them: Real Pool 3D, Real Snooker 3D and Pool/Snooker 2D.

Realistic controls, graphics and sound effects.

3D edition for serious players and 2D edition for casual players.
Powerful in-game social functions: buddy list, messenger, gifting and more.
Supports 3-ball, 8-ball, 9-ball, 15-ball, Blackjack, 14+1, killer, snooker and mini-snooker.
Supports team play and pub mode that allows 6 people playing in one table at the same time.
More than 10 types of prized tournaments are being held every day.
